Name: Honey Rum Grog
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STIR honey with other ingredients in base of shaker until the honey is dissolved.
Review: Not to be confused with the famous Tiki cocktail, Navy Grog , this Navy rum and honey sour is very enjoyable.
History: This Grog traces its origin back to the British Navy and Admiral Edward "Old Grog" Vernon's 1740 Order to Captains No.349 instructing that the daily ration of high-proof Navy rum was diluted with water and that where possible lime juice and sugar was made available.
